commands.name: az networkcloud l3network create
commands.summary: Create a new layer 3 (L3) network or update the properties of the existing network.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud l3network create --extended-location
                                 --l3-isolation-domain-id
                                 --l3-network-name
                                 --resource-group
                                 --vlan
                                 [--interface-name]
                                 [--ip-allocation-type {DualStack, IPV4, IPV6}]
                                 [--ipv4-connected-prefix]
                                 [--ipv6-connected-prefix]
                                 [--location]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--tags]
examples: az networkcloud l3network create --name "l3NetworkName" --extended-location name="/subscriptions/subscriptionId/resourceGroups/resourceGroupName/providers/Microsoft.ExtendedLocation/customLocations/clusterExtendedLocationName" type="CustomLocation" --location "location"  --interface-name "eth0" --ip-allocation-type "DualStack" --ipv4-connected-prefix "198.51.100.0/24" --ipv6-connected-prefix "2001:db8::/64" --l3-isolation-domain-id "/subscriptions/subscriptionId/resourceGroups/resourceGroupName/providers/Microsoft.ManagedNetworkFabric/l3IsolationDomains/l3IsolationDomainName" --vlan 12 --tags key1="myvalue1" key2="myvalue2" --resource-group "resourceGroupName"

commands.name: az networkcloud l3network delete
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud l3network delete [--ids]
                                 [--l3-network-name]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--resource-group]
                                 [--subscription]
                                 [--yes]

commands.name: az networkcloud l3network list
commands.summary: List layer 3 (L3) networks in the provided resource group or subscription.

commands.name: az networkcloud l3network show
commands.summary: Get properties of the provided layer 3 (L3) network.

commands.name: az networkcloud l3network update
commands.summary: Update tags associated with the provided layer 3 (L3) network.
examples: az networkcloud l3network update --name "l3NetworkName" --tags key1="myvalue1" key2="myvalue2" --resource-group "resourceGroupName"

commands.name: az networkcloud l3network wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
